scripts.android:build:qa: npm run android:bundle && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleQa && cd ..
scripts.android:build:stag: npm run android:bundle && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleStaging && cd ..
scripts.android:build:prod: npm run android:bundle && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android:deploy:qa: npm run android:bundle && cd android && bundle exec fastlane android qa && cd ..
scripts.android:deploy:stag: npm run android:bundle && cd android && bundle exec fastlane android stag && cd ..
scripts.android:deploy:prod: npm run android:bundle && cd android && bundle exec fastlane android prod && cd ..
scripts.android:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.ios: cd ./ios && pod install && cd .. && react-native run-ios --scheme 'SpotMeMobile - Dev'
scripts.ios:deploy:qa: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane ios qa && cd ..
scripts.ios:deploy:stag: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane ios stag && cd ..
scripts.ios:deploy:prod: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane ios prod && cd ..
